boardgame.name: The Expanse Board Game
The Expanse: Il Gioco da Tavolo
boardgame.description: The Expanse, a board game based on the Syfy television series of the same name, focuses on politics, conquest and intrigue similar to the board game Twilight Struggle, although with a shorter playing time. The card-driven game uses key images from the show, along with action points and events that allow players to move and place _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Fleets_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Influence_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In more detail, players represent Earth's UN forces, the military of Mars, the rebels of the O.P.A., and the mysterious corporation Protogen Inc. Each player has special abilities that must be maneuvered to gain advantage. Players increase their control over the solar system using characters and events from the universe of The Expanse._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: 28. Devon Dice Podcast part 2, Show packed full of content.
Ep 5 - Bringing Troyes Out of the Closet
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: The Expanse Boardgame: Doors and Corners
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: TGT 069: Games Based on Existing IPs

I have opened and checked the contents but otherwise in new condition. Postage will be £5.00 in the U.K. For European postage I have to use DPD (https://www.dpdlocal-online.co.uk) as they are the only service that is remotely cost effective from Northern Ireland. Additionally they don’t have drop off points (despite what their website says) so I have to arrange for them to collect from me. Please get a quote to your location for a 1.5kg parcel with dimensions of 36x26x16cm and decide for yourself whether you are happy with the postage costs before contacting me.

Also available for pick up in NYC (zip code: 10016). I accept Paypal, Venmo, Google wallet and Chase Quickpay. Price is negotiable if you buy multiple games. For international shipping, UPS/USPS/Fedex rate is usually about $30~$100 depending on distance. I can also ship with other options upon request.
